channel.title: pyenv on Into the Unknown
channel.description: Recent content in pyenv on Into the Unknown

item.title: pyenv 通过国内镜像安装 python
item.description: pyenv 通过国内镜像安装 python sudo curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yyuu/pyenv-installer/master/bin/pyenv-installer | bash export v=3.5.1 wget http://mirrors.sohu.com/python/$v/Python-$v.tar.xz -P ~/.pyenv/cache/;pyenv install $v TIPS: 这里使用的是搜狐的镜像源：http://mirrors.sohu.com/python/ 下
